title: ISic000807. I.Sicily inscription 000807
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΣΕΞΤΟΥ
2ΠΟΜΠΗΙΟΥ
3ΑΠΡΟΥ
4ΠΑΛΑΚΟΥ
5ΠΟΜΠΕΙΑΣ
6[·].[··].ΟΥ
7[---]
8ΠΑΛΑΚΟΥ

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of I.Lipara;
  • line.5: Libertini: ΠΟΜΠΗΙΑ
  • line.6: Libertini: [ΣΕΞΤΟΥ]; Kaibel: ΣΕ[Ξ}ΤΙΟΥ (?)

translation

commentary

The two fragments were originally treated as separate inscriptions (and published separately in IG), but Manni Piraino correctly identified that they are part of the same stone.

bibliography

  • Libertini 1921 219 no.13 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001875
  • Libertini 1921 219 no.14 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001875
  • Manni Piraino 1967 200 no.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001778
  • Bernabò Brea and Cavalier 1991 97 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002158
